title: FOUR MILLION Afghans could flee to BRITAIN and across Europe, Sir Michael Fallon warns | UK | News | Express.co.uk
text:
FOUR MILLION Afghan men could flee to BRITAIN and across Europe, Sir Michael Fallon warns FOUR MILLION Afghan men could flee to BRITAIN and across Europe, Sir Michael Fallon warns FOUR million Afghan men could migrate to Britain and other European countries if Western forces pull out of the war-torn country, Sir Michael Fallon has warned. PUBLISHED: 02:40, Mon, Feb 20, 2017 | UPDATED: 03:47, Mon, Feb 20, 2017 GETTY Four million Afghan men could migrate to Britain and other European countries, Sir Michael warned 
The Defence Secretary said British and Nato forces have to remain in Afghanistan as a number of terrorist cults “still pose a threat” despite Western nations entering the Islamic republic in 2001. 
The 64-year-old admitted Europe “will feel the consequences, very directly” if Afghanistan falls into the hands of jihadis and hinted that serviceman “should stay until the job is done”. Related articles 'ISIS supporting' teenager & 2 men charged for plotting terror attack 
Sir Fallon said: “First, there are transnational terrorist groups in Afghanistan that wish us harm at home and here in our democracies. 
“That is why we went in and those transnational terrorist groups are still there and they still pose a threat. If this country collapses, we here will feel the consequences, very directly. 
“There could be three to four million young Afghan men sent out by their villages to migrate westwards, and they are heading here.
